Im sure Im not thinking about this right, but it actually occurred because I was a money manager and we had COVID and they had something called forbearance where people were borrowing money, like a mortgage money, and then they were deciding that I cant make the payment. So their attorney would say, oh, just tell them that youre going to forbear. And I was getting pissed off that we make good loans, but they would tell me that theyre not going to pay. So I called my partner Jim Up, and hes a former partner at Price Waterhouse. And I said, hey, Jim, I love gold and silver. Figure out a way to make a profit every month on gold and silver, and then I dont have to worry about these assholes who are going to tell me that theyre going to forbear. So our funny story is he calls me up and that was Wednesday. He calls me up on Friday and he says, hey, Bruce, I figured out how to make a what do you call the candy that has peanut butter and chocolate? Reeses Peanut. He says, I figured out how to make the Reeses Peanut Butter Cup of Investment. I said, what the hell are you talking about? He said, I could make an investment that generates income every month based on the earnings of gold and silver. Okay, how do you do that? I could basically generate 6% to 12% on a pool of money every month, but gold really only makes money over time if it goes up. So he was an active component to gold.
